text:
quasardb - database technologies | www.quasardb.net | Paris/London/NYC | ONSITE | Developers and Sales | Full-time, permanent

We are the publishers of quasardb, a scale-out/scale-up transactional key-value store. We have customers in finance, aeronautics and adtech.

We have many openings!

- Evangelist - https://www.quasardb.net/jobs/jobs/2016/09/01/evangelist.htm...

- Software test engineer - https://www.quasardb.net/jobs/jobs/2016/09/01/software-test-...

- C++ developer - https://www.quasardb.net/jobs/jobs/2016/09/01/seniors-cpp-de...

- Test engineer - https://www.quasardb.net/jobs/jobs/2016/09/01/software-test-...

Complete listing here: https://www.quasardb.net/-Careers-

Internships also available.
